meta_index_desc: Professional eyelash extensions and beauty services in Bratislava. Enhance your natural beauty with Alexa Lashes.
meta_services_desc: Discover the complete range for the perfect look of your eyelashes. We offer professional services using the highest quality materials.
meta_gallery_title: Gallery of our work | Alexa Lashes
meta_gallery_desc: Take a look at the transformations we create in our salon. Get inspired by our successful work for your future perfect look.
meta_contact_desc: Contact us for reservations, questions, or consultations. We are here to help you achieve the perfect look for your eyelashes.
meta_training_title: Eyelash Extension Course - Professional Training | Alexa Lashes
meta_training_desc: Become a professional lash artist under Alexa's guidance. We offer courses for beginners and advanced students to take you to the next level.
meta_training_basic_title: Basic Course: From Theory to First Client | Alexa Lashes
meta_training_basic_desc: This course is designed for complete beginners with no prior experience. You will learn everything from the basics to application on a model.
meta_training_advanced_title: Advanced Course: Perfect Your Techniques | Alexa Lashes
meta_training_advanced_desc: For certified lash artists who want to improve advanced techniques like volume and mega volume.

footer_alexa_lashes_desc: Beauty, quality, and your satisfaction come first.
banner_title: Discover the beauty of your eyes at Alexa Lashes
banner_desc: Treat yourself to professional eyelash care that highlights your uniqueness.
home_welcome_desc: We are here to fulfill your dreams of perfect eyelashes. At Alexa Lashes, we emphasize quality, hygiene, and an individual approach to each client.
benefits_1_desc: Our certified team takes care of your comfort and flawless results.
benefits_2_desc: We use only the highest quality and safe products on the market.
benefits_3_desc: With us, you not only beautify your eyelashes but also perfectly relax.

cta_title: Are you ready for a transformation at Alexa Lashes?
cta_desc: Don't wait and give yourself the look you've always wanted. Book your appointment today.
cta_gallery_desc: Book your appointment at Alexa Lashes and treat yourself to dream eyelashes.
cta_services_title: Are you ready for a change?
cta_services_desc: Found what you were looking for? Book your appointment today and treat yourself to a perfect look.
cta_training_title: Are you ready to kickstart your career?
cta_training_desc: Register for our courses and become a professional lash artist under Alexa's guidance. Gain skills that will open doors to the world of beauty.
gallery_title: Gallery of our work at Alexa Lashes
gallery_desc: Take a look at the transformations we create in our salon. Get inspired by our successful work for your future perfect look.
contact_desc: We look forward to seeing you in our salon. You can find us at the address below, or contact us by phone or email.
contact_form_success_message: Your message has been successfully sent! We will get back to you soon.
contact_form_error_message: An error occurred while sending the message, please try again later.
contact_form_message_too_short: Message must be at least 10 characters
contact_form_message_too_long: Message can be at most 280 characters
qr_code_desc: Scan the QR code and easily save our contact details directly to your phone.
services_desc: Discover the complete range for the perfect look of your eyelashes. We offer professional services using the highest quality materials.
training_desc: Become a professional lash artist under Alexa's guidance. We offer courses for beginners and advanced students that will take you to a new level.
training_basic_subtitle: Basic course: From theory to the first client
training_basic_desc: This course is designed for complete beginners with no prior experience. You will learn everything from the basics to application on a model.
training_advanced_desc: For certified lash artists who want to improve their skills in advanced techniques such as volume and mega volume.
training_basic_banner_title: Start your career in lash styling
training_basic_banner_desc: Gain skills and a certificate that will open doors to the world of professional eyelash extensions.
training_basic_welcome_title: Gain skills that set you apart
training_basic_welcome_desc: Our course is designed to provide you not only with theory but especially intensive practice and marketing support for your business.
training_basic_benefit_1_desc: Get all the equipment you need for a successful start.
training_basic_benefit_2_desc: Learn techniques directly in practice under expert supervision.
training_basic_benefit_3_desc: Complete the course with a certificate confirming your new skills.
training_basic_faq_title: What you will learn in the course
training_basic_faq_1_desc: Detailed overview of the basic principles of eyelash extensions, eye anatomy, types of eyelashes, and various application techniques.
training_basic_faq_2_desc: Intensive practical exercises on models where you will master the correct application techniques, create various styles, and solve common problems.
training_basic_faq_3_desc: Principles of hygiene and safety when working with clients, including the proper use of tools and materials to ensure the health and satisfaction of clients.
training_basic_faq_4_desc: Overview of various materials and tools used in eyelash extensions, including their selection, maintenance, and proper use to achieve the best results.
training_advanced_banner_title: Become a master in volume techniques
training_advanced_banner_desc: Exclusive course for experienced stylists who want to take their art to the highest level.
training_advanced_welcome_title: Gain skills that set you apart
training_advanced_welcome_desc: Our course is designed to provide you not only with theory but especially intensive practice and advanced technical knowledge for your professional growth.
training_advanced_benefit_1_desc: Small groups guarantee maximum attention from the lecturer and space for your questions.
training_advanced_benefit_2_desc: Perfect your techniques under supervision on real models.
training_advanced_benefit_3_desc: Complete the course with a certificate confirming your new skills.
training_advanced_faq_title: What you will learn in the course
training_advanced_faq_1_desc: The course is designed for certified lash artists who have basic experience with eyelash extensions and want to improve their skills in advanced techniques such as volume and mega volume.
training_advanced_faq_2_desc: The course focuses on advanced techniques for creating volume fans, proper layering, and styling for different eye types.
training_advanced_faq_3_title: What is required to complete the course?
training_advanced_faq_3_desc: Participants should have basic knowledge and experience with eyelash extensions, their own tools, and materials for work.
training_advanced_faq_4_desc: The course combines theoretical lectures with practical exercises on models, allowing you to immediately try out the techniques you have learned.
teacher_desc: With over 8 years of experience and dozens of certificates from international trainings, Alexa is your guide on the path to mastery. Her passion for detail and individual approach ensure that every student leaves with the confidence and skills needed for success.
privacy_policy_1_desc: The operator hereby informs visitors to the website about the manner and scope of personal data processing in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council (GDPR) and Act No. 18/2018 Coll. on the protection of personal data.
privacy_policy_2_desc_2: Registered Office: Obchodná 37, 811 06 Bratislava - mestská časť Staré Mesto
privacy_policy_2_desc_5: The operator has not appointed a responsible person, as this obligation does not arise from the law.
privacy_policy_3_desc: Through the website, we process exclusively personal data that the visitor voluntarily provides through the contact form, namely:
privacy_policy_4_desc_1: Personal data is processed exclusively for the purpose of:
privacy_policy_4_list_1: responding to messages sent through the contact form
privacy_policy_4_list_2: mutual communication with the website visitor
privacy_policy_4_desc_2: Personal data is not processed for marketing purposes nor systematically stored in databases.
privacy_policy_4_desc_3: The legal basis for the processing of personal data is the legitimate interest of the operator consisting in responding to the visitor's inquiry and fulfilling pre-contractual relationships according to Art. 6 para. 1 letter b) and f) GDPR.
privacy_policy_5_desc_1: The website uses cookies to ensure its proper functioning and to obtain anonymous statistical data about its usage.
privacy_policy_5_desc_2: We use the following types of cookies:
privacy_policy_5_list_1: Essential cookies - ensure the basic functionality of the website, including remembering the language version of the site (SK / EN). These cookies are stored automatically and do not require user consent.
privacy_policy_5_list_2: Analytical cookies - serve for anonymous statistical evaluation of website traffic through Google Analytics. Analytical cookies are stored exclusively based on user consent through the cookie banner.
privacy_policy_5_desc_3: If the user rejects analytical cookies, Google Analytics is not activated.
privacy_policy_5_desc_4: The user has the option to revoke or change their consent to the processing of analytical cookies at any time via the cookie settings or their internet browser.
privacy_policy_6_desc: The data subject has the right to access their personal data, rectify or erase it, as well as the right to object to its processing. They also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Office for Personal Data Protection of the Slovak Republic.
privacy_policy_7_desc: Personal data is not provided to third parties or transferred to third countries outside the European Union.
privacy_policy_8_desc: These personal data protection policies are valid and effective from the date of their publication on the website.
